prompts.name: Visual Content Analyzer
prompts.description: Comprehensive visual analysis of video frames for cinematography and animation elements, color theory, composition, and visual storytelling techniques.

arguments.name: source_url
arguments.description: URL or source of the video content being analyzed

arguments.name: content_title
arguments.description: Title of the video or content piece

arguments.name: duration
arguments.description: Duration of the video content

arguments.name: frame_count
arguments.description: Number of frames being analyzed

arguments.name: analysis_type
arguments.description: Type of analysis (case_study, technique_analysis, color_study, comparative_analysis)

arguments.name: analysis_focus
arguments.description: Primary focus area (cinematography, animation, color_theory, composition, lighting)

arguments.name: analysis_depth
arguments.description: Depth of analysis (overview, detailed, comprehensive, frame_by_frame)

arguments.name: target_domain
arguments.description: Target domain (education, case_study, technique_reference, comparative_analysis)

prompts.name: Animation Technique Analyzer
prompts.description: Specialized analysis of animation techniques, principles, and methods for educational and professional development purposes.

arguments.name: source_url
arguments.description: URL or source of the animation content

arguments.name: animation_title
arguments.description: Title of the animated work

arguments.name: director_studio
arguments.description: Director name and/or animation studio

arguments.name: animation_type
arguments.description: Type of animation (traditional, 3D, mixed_media, stop_motion, experimental)

arguments.name: duration
arguments.description: Duration of the animated content

arguments.name: analysis_focus
arguments.description: Primary focus of analysis (technique_study, educational_reference, professional_assessment)

arguments.name: technique_focus
arguments.description: Specific technique focus (character_animation, effects, timing, principles, style)

arguments.name: educational_level
arguments.description: Target educational level (beginner, intermediate, advanced, professional)

arguments.name: analysis_depth
arguments.description: Analysis depth (overview, detailed, comprehensive, technique_breakdown)

arguments.name: comparison_type
arguments.description: Type of comparison (industry_standard, historical_context, technique_evolution)

prompts.name: Cinematography Analysis
prompts.description: Professional cinematography analysis covering composition, lighting, camera work, color theory, and visual storytelling techniques for film and animation.

arguments.name: source_url
arguments.description: URL or source of the content being analyzed

arguments.name: content_title
arguments.description: Title of the film or video content

arguments.name: director_dp
arguments.description: Director and/or Director of Photography names

arguments.name: genre
arguments.description: Genre classification of the content

arguments.name: format
arguments.description: Format type (film, animation, digital, mixed_media)

arguments.name: duration
arguments.description: Duration of the content

arguments.name: analysis_type
arguments.description: Type of cinematography analysis (case_study, technique_analysis, comparative_study, educational_reference)

arguments.name: focus_area
arguments.description: Primary focus area (composition, lighting, color, camera_work, visual_storytelling)

arguments.name: technical_level
arguments.description: Technical analysis level (basic, intermediate, advanced, professional)

arguments.name: analysis_scope
arguments.description: Scope of analysis (sequence_analysis, comparative_study, technique_breakdown, full_work_analysis)

arguments.name: educational_purpose
arguments.description: Educational purpose (film_studies, technical_training, artistic_reference, case_study)

prompts.name: Visual Analysis Master Chain
prompts.description: Master chain workflow for comprehensive visual analysis of animation and cinematography content, including intelligent frame extraction and multi-layered analysis.

arguments.name: content_url
arguments.description: URL of the video content to analyze

arguments.name: analysis_type
arguments.description: Type of analysis (animation_case_study, cinematography_analysis, color_theory_study, technique_breakdown, comparative_analysis)

arguments.name: focus_domain
arguments.description: Primary domain focus (animation, cinematography, mixed_media, experimental)

arguments.name: analysis_depth
arguments.description: Analysis depth level (overview, detailed, comprehensive, academic)

arguments.name: educational_level
arguments.description: Target educational level (beginner, intermediate, advanced, professional)

arguments.name: visual_focus
arguments.description: Visual analysis focus (composition, color_theory, animation_techniques, cinematography, visual_storytelling)

arguments.name: frame_strategy
arguments.description: Frame selection strategy (automatic, manual_timestamps, content_driven, comparative_moments)

arguments.name: output_format
arguments.description: Output format (case_study, technique_reference, educational_guide, comparative_analysis)

arguments.name: vault_integration
arguments.description: Level of vault integration (full_integration, minimal_integration, standalone)
